commitMessage:
test(workflow): update test assertions for /refine command workflow

Updates test files to reflect the /decide â†’ /refine command rename and new 
workflow pattern. Tests now validate the refined implementation details phase 
that separates high-level exploration from detailed implementation planning.

## What Changed

Implementation (15 files modified):
- src/commands/refine.ts - Core refinement command updates (89 lines modified)
- src/commands/build.ts - Updated to load refinements.md (19 lines)
- src/commands/status.ts - Shows "Refinement âœ“" status (4 lines)

Test Updates (11 test files, 154 lines):
- src/commands/build.smoke.test.ts - Tests load refinements.md
- src/commands/refine.smoke.test.ts (created via earlier work)
- src/commands/template-compliance.smoke.test.ts - /refine template validation
- src/commands/visual-patterns.smoke.test.ts - Visual rendering updates
- src/commands/visual-rendering.smoke.test.ts - Choice formatting updates
- src/lib/claude-commands.smoke.test.ts - Command discovery tests
- src/test/documentation-hierarchy.smoke.test.ts - Documentation structure
- src/test/explore-template-what-vs-how.smoke.test.ts - Template validation
- test/pm-integration.integration.test.ts - PM workflow integration
- test/pm-integration.smoke.test.ts - PM smoke tests

Documentation (2 files):
- .hodge/project_management.md - Workflow tracking updated
- .hodge/features/HODGE-377.6/ship-record.json - Validation results

## Why This Change

Part of HODGE-377.6 (Workflow Refinement). This completes the test suite 
updates for the workflow separation that enables efficient PO/developer 
collaboration by separating "alignment on requirements" (exploration) from 
"implementation details" (refinement).

The test updates ensure all workflow commands properly handle the new 
refinements.md file and /refine command pattern, validating that:
- /build loads refinements.md instead of decisions.md
- /status shows "Refinement âœ“" instead of "Decisions âœ“"
- Template compliance validates /refine command structure
- PM integration supports refinement workflow
